Testimonials.title: Founder of IFC, Michael
Testimonials.description: Working with Charles was a breeze. Professional, flexible, and nailed our website. Couldn't be happier with the result! Highly recommend him to anyone.

Testimonials.title: Music Artist - Niasha
Testimonials.description: Charles is a visionary! I brought my idea about having an interactive website that was true to my brand nd personal expression and he showed his dedication thorough diligent research and presented a visually captivating concept for my website. If you're looking professionalism, creativity, collaborative design then Charles is the one.

Testimonials.title: Me - Charles Joma
Testimonials.description: While i've only had 1 freelance project and 1 potential, i am on the lookout for more and i felt a carousel would feel wrong with only 2 slides
